AboutText: This system streamlines Gram Panchayat services. Citizens can apply for various government schemes, track their status, and receive updatesâ€”all from a single platform. Ministry of Panchayati Raj looks into all matters relating to the Panchayati Raj and Panchayati Raj Institutions. It was created in May 2004. The ministry is headed by a minister of cabinet rank.
Update1: New scheme for rural housing launched
Update3: Empanelment of Training Agencies under Revamped RGSA
Update4: Result of appointment of contract-based consultants for PESA Cell (Rashtriya Gram Swaraj Abhiyan) in the light of advertisement notice dated 18.12.2024.
